Text: How much hatred and ignorance, even in the introduction.
I know, its amazing the length the Romish Church will go through to get to its objectives.

WOW, I just graduated highschool last may and maybe once in my 12 years of PUBLIC TAX FUNDED school did I hear about the calamity that is the Roman Empire.

I have been spending the last 2 years reading all I can about the state of our global crisis.. The history of things seems endless and I want to thank you UR-Djavu for this upload for making it THAT much easier.
